named-query.name: READ_CARBARN_BY_CARBARN_NAME
named-query.query: FROM com.ssbusy.core.carbarn.domain.Carbarn cb where cb.name like :carbarnName

named-query.name: READ_CARBARN_BY_CARBARN_ADDRESS
named-query.query: FROM com.ssbusy.core.carbarn.domain.Carbarn cb where cb.address like :carbarnAddress

named-query.name: READ_CARBARN_BY_LATITUDE_AND_LONGITUDE
named-query.query: FROM com.ssbusy.core.carbarn.domain.Carbarn cb where cb.id in(select ce.carbarn.id from com.ssbusy.core.carbarn.domain.CarEntrance ce where (ce.latitude between :beginLatitude and :endLatitude) and (ce.longitude between :beginLongitude and :endLongitude)) order by cb.price
